suggest.tecnick.com/tcpdf: TCPDF is a PHP class for generating PDF documents
suggest.dompdf/dompdf: DOMPDF is a CSS 2.1 compliant HTML to PDF converter
suggest.mpdf/mpdf: A PHP class to generate PDF files from HTML with Unicode/UTF-8 and CJK support
suggest.h4cc/wkhtmltopdf-amd64: Convert html to pdf using webkit (qtwebkit). Static linked linux binary for amd64 systems.
